title: Recovery of pending dues such as assessment, compensation, occupational charges, non-agricultural tax/dues etc
clause_text: Recovery of pending dues such as assessment, compensation, occupational charges, non-agricultural tax/dues etc. pending with public authorities such as State Govt, MHADA, and/or MCGM shall be dealt with separately and not be linked to grant of approval or building permission to the DRP.
